channel.title: National Park on David Calhoun's blog
channel.description: Recent content in National Park on David Calhoun's blog

item.title: Quick failed trip to Pinnacles National Park
item.description: I’d been looking for a night like tonight for a long time, when the new moon fell squarely on the weekend. The only problem: unpredictable weather! I drive about an hour and a half south on the 101 and then the 25 to head towards the east Pinnacles entrance, which I’d never been at before. I also chatted with Yuka over LINE for a bit of it, at least until the reception got bad and dropped the call about ten minutes beofre getting to the park.

item.title: The Coffee That Made the UFO Dance
A ride on Yosemite's Sugar Pine Railroad
